text:
Looking for information around setup for third party traffic balance as referred in the white paper
```Coin to prepay their traffic directly, or they can arrange with a third party to set up a traffic
balance (like a cell phone data plan paid in fiat currency) on their behalf. Canton participant
nodes can then use the Global Synchronizer, with or without Canton Coin, by drawing down this
traffic balance. Super Validators provide a small amount of transaction traffic for free, and any
additional traffic is prepaid ```
the documentation here <https://docs.dev.sync.global/deployment/traffic.html#traffic-top-ups-how-does-one-buy-traffic> says it is out of the scope of this documentation. Where can information about this be found to understand the implementation.
Thanks

additional traffic is prepaid
the documentation here

says it is out of the scope of this documentation. Where can information about this be found to understand the implementation.
Thanks
